elements.text:
Is a 3D sound effect player triggered by an event
Extends AudioStreamPlayer3D
designer can add 'SoundEffectPlayer3D' to any scene using "add child node"
designer can select a node that has signals to subscribe to in the available tree scope
designer can subscribe the player to an event signal using signal string name
designer can configure the sound effect to be played
when 'SoundEffectPlayer3D' receives subscribed signal it emits sound effect
designer may subscribe the player to an explicit stop signal
when 'SoundEffectPlayer3D' receives subscribed 'stop' signal the sound effect immediately stops playing
elements.originalText:
Is a 3D sound effect player triggered by an event
Extends AudioStreamPlayer3D
designer can add 'SoundEffectPlayer3D' to any scene using "add child node"
designer can select a node that has signals to subscribe to in the available tree scope
designer can subscribe the player to an event signal using signal string name
designer can configure the sound effect to be played
when 'SoundEffectPlayer3D' receives subscribed signal it emits sound effect
designer may subscribe the player to an explicit stop signal
when 'SoundEffectPlayer3D' receives subscribed 'stop' signal the sound effect immediately stops playing
